ie.gmit

Class FileReaderWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.FileReaderWriter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Encoding

    public class FileReaderWriter
extends Object
    Author:
    Pawel This class provides methods that can read strings from files and convert them to byte[]. It can also write text to file using Input and Output stream. This class uses also JSoup API to provide reading text elements from URL.

      • getURLFile

        public static String getURLFile(String url)
                         throws Exception
        Connecting to a URL and takes specified URL data as a text.
        Parameters:
        url - URL address eg. http://www.google.com
        Returns:
        String representing text from a URL.
        Throws:

      • getURLTextElement

        public static String getURLTextElement(String url,
                       String pageElement)
                                throws Exception
        Gets URL element using JSoup API and converts it to text.
        Parameters:
        url - URL address of a website eg. http://en.wikipedia.org/
        pageElement - URL element that will be taken from website and converted to text, eg. , #mp-itn b a
        Returns:
        URL element in text form.
        Throws:
        Exception

                        throws IOException
        Shows list of links that the URL is using.
        Parameters:
        url - URL address of a website eg. http://en.wikipedia.org/
        Returns:
        null
        Throws:
        IOException
